subject: Baseball
World Series
Coaches and Managers
Awards, Decorations and Honors
lead_paragraph: Thirteen years after Joe Torre won his first World Series ring, his former player and assistant, Joe Girardi, was on the verge of winning his first as a manager.
snippet: Thirteen years after Joe Torre won his first World Series ring, his former player and assistant, Joe Girardi, was on the verge of winning his first as a manager.
